long_description: The REI Chevron Stripe crew socks offer everyday comfort in a fun, casual style. REI Chevron Stripe sock bottoms are padded with lightweight terry; legs and tops of feet are a slim flat-knit. Merino wool naturally regulates temperature in any climate, wicks moisture and resists odors. Stretch nylon provides durability; Lycra(R) spandex enhances flexibility and improves fit. Flat toe seams prevent chafing. Machine wash inside out in cold water, gentle cycle; do not iron or dry clean. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The REI Chevron Stripe crew socks offer everyday comfort in a fun, casual style.
